data: NICU Suspected Late Onset Sepsis (Greater than 72 Hours of Life)
Refer to NICU Suspected Late Onset Neonatal Sepsis Greater than 72 Hours of Life Worksheet (Algorithm)
Initiate NICU Suspected Late Onset Neonatal Sepsis Worksheet
Refer to Neonatal Drug Manual and/or pharmacist for dose interval

Consider therapeutic drug monitoring with antibiotic therapy beyond 48 hours. Place therapeutic drug monitoring instruction orders as required. Consult pharmacy for subsequent gentamicin doses and levels for patients less than 30 weeks. For suspected meningitis, select cloxacillin 50 mg/kg/dose
Select [cloxacillin AND gentamicin] OR [cefoTAXime AND vancomycin]
25 mg/kg, IV, q12h interval, order duration: 7 day, first dose: STAT

Draw level within 30 minutes prior to 2nd dose administration (preferably, just before dose is given)
Draw level 30 minutes after the end of the 2nd infusion
Draw level within 30 minutes prior to 3rd dose administration
Draw level within 30 minutes prior to 4th dose administration
Draw level 60 minutes after the end of the 3rd infusion
Draw level 60 minutes after the end of the 4th infusion
